hymn.title: But for Me I Will Wait on Jehovah

layout.singingstanza: But for me, I will wait on Je -- ho -- vah; I will look for the God of my strength; In the dark -- ness Je -- ho -- vah will shine like a light; Let my en -- e -- mies no more re -- joice. For I fall, but then I will rise up; Praise the Lord, Who's the strength of my heart; So for me, I will wait on the Lord Je -- sus Christ; And in Christ I will rise up a -- gain.
